about_the_game:
Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones - Official Digital Artbook


Let this artbook be your gateway into the creation process of Stygian. Enter a world of madness and mystery through concept illustrations, portraits, environment objects and animations that take you all the way from the city of Arkham to the depths of the Abyss...
detailed_description:
Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones - Official Digital Artbook


Let this artbook be your gateway into the creation process of Stygian. Enter a world of madness and mystery through concept illustrations, portraits, environment objects and animations that take you all the way from the city of Arkham to the depths of the Abyss...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: PDF file only.
